mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS m_Id , member_pw AS m_Pw , member_name AS m_Name , level_code AS m_Level , member_addrss AS m_Addr , member_email AS m_Email , member_phone AS m_Phone , member_reg_date AS m_Reg_Date , member_account_status AS m_Acnt_Status , member_incentive AS m_Incentive FROM tb_member AS m where m.level_code = 'level_4';
